text:
<@U0MKH0BE0> Hey Melodee, apologies I couldn't make your touch base with Matt, but here are the next steps from what I understand: 

1. Change type to title case
2. Experiment with different weights between conference rooms and secondary rooms

Goal is to show Matt your progress so we can determine which option will go up for paper prototyping. *Your job is to make sure an approved version is taped up on all of the rooms by Monday 5/1. Avery and Charles will be on site at 811 all day Friday, so please coordinate and make this happen.*
Awesome. Also numerals! Lmk how I can help.
